item.title: Miri add a quote by Mario Andretti
item.description: "If everything seems under control, you're not going fast enough." -- Mario Andretti

item.title: Miri add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Miri add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "I'll be more enthusiastic about encouraging thinking outside the box when there's evidence of any thinking going on inside it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Miri add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "He says gods like to see an atheist around. Gives them something to aim at." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Miri add a quote by George F. Will
item.description: "The nice part about being a pessimist is that you are constantly being either proven right or pleasantly surprised." -- George F. Will

item.title: Miri add a quote by Paula Poundstone
item.description: "The wages of sin are death, but by the time taxes are taken out, it's just sort of a tired feeling. " -- Paula Poundstone

item.title: Miri add a quote by Alfred Hitchcock
item.description: "Seeing a murder on television... can help work off one's antagonisms. And if you haven't any antagonisms, the commercials will give you some." -- Alfred Hitchcock

item.title: Miri add a quote by Michel de Montaigne
item.description: "I prefer the company of peasants because they have not been educated sufficiently to reason incorrectly." -- Michel de Montaigne

item.title: Miri add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Miri add a quote by Voltaire
Miri add a quote by Edgar Bergen
item.description: "Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance?" -- Edgar Bergen

item.title: Miri add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Miri add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I am at two with nature." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Miri add a quote by Arnold Lobel
item.description: "Books to the ceiling, Books to the sky, My pile of books is a mile high. How I love them! How I need them! I'll have a long beard by the time I read them." -- Arnold Lobel

item.title: Miri add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I told my psychiatrist that everyone hates me. He said I was being ridiculous - everyone hasn't met me yet." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Miri add a quote by Stanley Kubrick
item.description: "If you can talk brilliantly about a problem, it can create the consoling illusion that it has been mastered." -- Stanley Kubrick

item.title: Miri add a quote by Bernard Bailey
item.description: "When they discover the center of the universe, a lot of people will be disappointed to discover they are not it. " -- Bernard Bailey

item.title: Miri add a quote by R. K. Milholland
item.description: "Typos are very important to all written form. It gives the reader something to look for so they aren’t distracted by the total lack of content in your writing." -- R. K. Milholland

item.title: Miri add a quote by Tom Stoppard
item.description: "It's not the voting that's democracy, it's the counting." -- Tom Stoppard

item.title: Miri add a quote by Frederick L. Collins
item.description: "There are two types of people-those who come into a room and say, "Well, here I am!" and those who come in and say, "Ah, there you are." -- Frederick L. Collins

item.title: Miri add a quote by Augustine of Hippo
item.description: "Da mihi castitatem et continentiam, sed noli modo (Give me chastity and continence, but not just yet)!" -- Augustine of Hippo

item.title: Miri add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Age is not a particularly interesting subject. Anyone can get old. All you have to do is live long enough." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Miri add a quote by Georg Christoph Lichtenberg
item.description: "Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together." -- Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

item.title: Miri add a quote by James Thurber
item.description: "Why do you have to be a nonconformist like everybody else?" -- James Thurber

item.title: Miri add a quote by Francois de La Rochefoucauld
item.description: "We rarely think people have good sense unless they agree with us." -- Francois de La Rochefoucauld

item.title: Miri add a quote by Evan Davis
item.description: "Someday we'll look back on this moment and plow into a parked car." -- Evan Davis

item.title: Miri add a quote by Brendan Behan
item.description: "When I came back to Dublin I was courtmartialed in my absence and sentenced to death in my absence, so I said they could shoot me in my absence." -- Brendan Behan

item.title: Miri add a quote by Jean Kerr
item.description: "I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being only skin-deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?" -- Jean Kerr

item.title: Miri add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "It is of interest to note that while some dolphins are reported to have learned English - up to fifty words used in correct context - no human being has been reported to have learned dolphinese." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Miri add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met." -- Rodney Dangerfield
